Document.Focus: LH response to GnRH blood test

Synonyms.Synonym: Luteinizing hormone response to gonadotropin-releasing hormone

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about LH response to GnRH blood test
QAPair.Answer: LH response to GnRH is a blood test to help determine if your pituitary gland can correctly respond to gonadotropin releasing hormone (GnRH). LH stands for luteinizing hormone.
